title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Prospective Teachers Applying Creativity Education and Outcomes-Based Instruction

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary education curriculum and foundational pedagogical methods
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can design OBTL-based lesson plans to foster creativity in science classes.
By comparatively analyzing creativity education strategies across age groups (teens/20s/30s), methodologies applicable to elementary education can be derived.
Learners can plan science experiments using Design Thinking techniques and develop outcome-based assessment rubrics.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
